definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: divide, share (NH id.; Aram. [[חֲלַק]] field, [[חוּלְּקָא]] portion, h.laq divide, determine, decree; Ar. xalaqa measure, measure off; As. eḳlu, possession, field, Jäger:BAS ii. 296; Eth. xelaqe:: 1. 2, is enumerate, xulqu: xulqu: enumeration, number)—

divide, apportion, sq. acc. (of gods) and [[לְ]] pers. De 4:19, De 29:25; acc. not expressed Ne 13:13 (ref. to offerings and tithes); c. acc. (of land) Jos 14:5 (P), Jos 18:2 (JE), 2Sa 19:30: obj. people Ne 9:22; [[עִם]] ´[[ח]] divide with others Jos 22:8 (D ?).
assign, distribute : Levites over ([[על]]) temple 2Ch 23:18, cf. 1Ch 24:4, 1Ch 24:5.
assign, impart, sq. [[בִּינׇה]] & [[לְ]] Job 39:17.
share (in), sq. acc. silver Job 27:17; inheritance Pr 17:2; spoil 1Sa 30:24 (obj. om.); sq. [[עם]] have shares with [[עם גַּנׇּב]] ´[[ח]] Pr 29:24.
divide up = plunder the temple, sq. acc. 2Ch 28:21 (v. Be).
reflex., divide oneself Ge 14:15 (i.e. one's men).
pass. be divided:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: apportioned, the land Nu 26:53, Nu 26:55 (by lot) v:Nu 26:56 (id.); all P.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of people, divided into two factions 1Ki 16:21.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of light, parted, spread abroad Job 38:24.
trans. assign, distribute 1Ch 23:6, 1Ch 24:3, but trans. Niph. is unlikely, v. infr.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[חִלְּקוּ]] Joe 4:2; [[וְחִלַּקְתֶּם]] consec. Ez Eze 47:21; sf. [[חִלְּקָם]] La 4:16; 3 fs. sf. [[חִלְּקַ֫תָּה]] Is 34:17; 2 ms. sf. [[וְחִלַּקְתָּם]] Ez Eze 5:1; —Impf. [[יְחַלֵּק]] Ge 49:27 + 4 t., etc.; prob. rd. [[יְחַלְּקֵם]] 1Ch 23:6, 1Ch 24:3 (v. supr.

divide, apportion: food, at festival 2Sa 6:19, sq. acc. & [[לְ]] = 1Ch 16:3, garments Ps 22:19, sorrows Job 21:17 (no [[לְ]]); give a portion to, sq. [[לְ]] (no acc. expr.) Is 53:12; a land Joe 4:2 (no ind. obj.) Jos 19:51 (P), also Mic 2:4, Ps 60:8 = Ps 108:8, Da 11:39; sq. acc. & [[לְ]] Jos 13:7, Jos 18:10, 1Ki 18:6, Is 34:17, Ez Eze 47:21; divide hair (symbol.) Ez Eze 5:1; divide spoil ([[שָׁלָל]]) Is 9:2, Pr 16:19, Ge 49:27 (poem), Ex 15:9 (song); Ju Jdg 5:30, Ps 68:13, Is 53:12.
assign, distribute: Levites to their service, prob. 1Ch 23:6, 1Ch 24:3 (v. supr.)
scatter, sq. acc. Ge 49:7 (poem) (‖[[הפיץ]]), La 4:16.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הֻלַּק]] Is 33:23; [[וְחֻלַּק]] consec. Zec 14:1; Impf. 3 fs. [[תְּחֻלָָּק]] Am 7:17; be divided, of land Am 7:17; spoil Is 33:23, Zec 14:1.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְהִתְחַלְּקוּ]] consec. Jos 18:5 divide (land) among themselves.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Inf. [[לַחֲלִק]] Je 37:12; to receive a portion (denom. fr. [[חֵלֶק]]), but dub.
